content:
leamas pushed 388 commits to branch debian/master. Commits by leamas (283), HamishB (58), Bas Couwenberg (18) and others (29).

  • www.opencpn.org, debianization by Anton Martchukov (9d4df7ba25b)
  • Initial import of debian folder for OpenCPN 1.3.6 (78ea7ef24fb)
  • Updated Debian patches to revised versions with DEP-3 headers. Minor standards conformance update. (dbf7f0ece5e)
  • Updated for the new upstream OpenCPN version 2.1.624a. (cc70dac318d)
  • need dpatch; don't need imagemagick (3e93222c8c2)
  • back out dpatch attempt (1f638de50c9)
  • Updated to 2.2.918 git version, removed desktop-entry-spec.patch as applied upstream. (1405c1b4b44)
  • update for upstream version git~2.4.412 (944efe0d715)
  • Suggest xcalib to lower contrast for night vision (8b0a2b29844)
  • more plugin path patching (415be273589)
  • Use system's zlib, bzip2 instead of embedded copy (edf019ea51e)
  • tweaks as per comments from upstream (caa1da6c557)
  • Use xtide's WVS coastline instead of shipping a clone (177af3224b2)
  • use system copy of gpl2.txt (586dc06811c)
  • Point to packaged doc directory (54c105f2b36)
  • notes on harmonics data (2cc2dbb073d)
  • updated for 2.4.423, copyright notes (306ada2de5c)
  • Split off opencpn-data and opencpn-doc packages (88a0e2de1f2)
  • clean up install of READMEs (1ac0c01e55c)
  • linewrap (95e66d3f98f)
    [and 368 more commit(s)]
